div.head: Experiment title:
div.p: Radioparagenesis: a novel synthesis route to obtain structures far from equilibrium EXAFS study on 55 Fe 2 O 3

div.head: Names and affiliations of applicants (* indicates experimentalists):
div.p: Dr. Wolfgang Morgenroth* Dr. Lkhamsuren Bayarjargal Prof. Bjoern Winkler

div.head: Report:
div.p: Unfortunately, the limited amount of this unique sample was not enough material to produce an EXAFS spectrum which could be used for further analysis.
